Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the snake three-finger toxin family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: IC50=8.9 Î¼g/ml for U937 and 6.7 Î¼g/ml for K562
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: This three-finger cytotoxin has antiproliferative, cytotoxic and apoptotic activitieS. Both in vivo and in vitro experimental results suggests that this protein possess anticancer potential. Also shows neurotoxicity, cardiotoxicity and myotoxicity.

Literature.Title: A heat stable protein toxin (drCT-I) from the Indian Viper (Daboiarusselli russelli) venom having antiproliferative, cytotoxic andapoptotic activitieS.
Literature.Author: Gomes A., Choudhury S. R., Saha A., Mishra R., Giri B., Biswas A.K., Debnath A., Gomes A.

Literature.Title: Purification, crystallization and preliminary X-ray structuralstudies of a 7.2 kDa cytotoxin isolated from the venom of Daboiarusselli russelli of the Viperidae family.
Literature.Author: Choudhury S. R., Gomes A., Gomes A., Dattagupta J.K., Sen U.
